node.html: A nicer look at your GitHub profile and repo stats. Includes data visualizations of your top languages, starred repositories, and sort through your top repos by number of stars, forks, and size.
A simple Google Keep clone built with React Hooks + Contexts for state management and Node.js & MongoDB as backend.
A site for a revolutionary healthcare company, including an Algolia instant search integration
A marketing site for an ambitious life sciences venture capital company.

Web app that allows people to crowdsource a party's music queue. Allows people to request songs, upvote songs, rate songs, etc. so the DJ can see how the crowd is feeling and queue songs accordingly. Won Best UI/UX Design at Hackbeanpot 2017.
Created a simple IMDb clone with a touch of a UI component library callled Evergreen and an IMDb API source.
